titleInfo.title: Meet Lee Greenwood Christmas to Christmas Center Court (1312)

mods.accessCondition: This digital image is the property of the Country Music Hall of FameÂ® and Museum and is protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this file, contact print@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite image information in email.
mods.abstract: Two color half sheet (green and red on gray) announcing Lee Greenwood at the Center Court in the Rivergate Mall in celebration of his new Christmas album, Christmas to Christmas, on November 17. Poster is incomplete and probably would have included another application of color. To view the paperwork for this poster, see https://digi.countrymusichalloffame.org/digital/collection/hatch3/id/21154.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
